title: AI Video Generator
desc: Quickly generate various custom videos using AI

task.title: Create Video
task.total: A total of {{count}} videos being generated

prompt.title: Video Content
prompt.desc: Please enter the content of the video you want to generate

first_frame.title: First Frame
first_frame.desc: Drag or click to upload an image

last_frame.title: Last Frame
last_frame.desc: Drag or click to upload an image

loop.title: Video Loop
loop.desc: Choose whether to enable video loop

audio.title: Sound Settings
audio.desc: Choose whether to enable video sound

example.prompt: In the morning mist, sunlight filters through treetops, casting dappled shadows, draping the earth in a golden veil. In the distance, green mountains stretch layer upon layer to the horizon, merging with the azure sky. Nearby, a stream flows gently, crystal clear, with wildflowers blooming along the banks—red, yellow, purple, like the earth’s palette. As a breeze passes, the fragrance of flowers and earth mingles, fresh and pleasing. At this moment, the world is so tranquil, it’s as if time has stood still, making one feel peaceful and content.
